name: 22h38
description:
22h38

A tiny adventure taking place hours before the end of the world

The world ends at 22h38. 

Fortunately, you keep respawning.

Explore the world to find shrines and discover more about this tragedy. And maybe prevent it?

** Controls **

Arrow Keys - Move

E - Interact

Shrines helps you progress further

The web version is significantly slower than the build. If you can we recommand to download the build.

05/04/22 -> Updated web build to fix and issue with UI scaling on high DPI monitors
